channel.title: Workshops on SIPPS
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on SIPPS

item.title: Coding (basic)
item.description: On this page, you will find resources associated with each session in the basic-track coding workshop (zoom link, pw: sipps2021). A few days before each session, please check this page to make sure you’ve downloaded any necessary files in advance (if needed). After each session, the page will be updated with links to the corresponding zoom recording, as well as any additional materials/answer keys/etc. that were referenced during the workshop.

item.title: Coding (advanced)
item.description: On this page, you will find resources associated with each session in the advanced-track coding workshop (zoom link, pw: sipps2021). A few days before each session, please check this page to make sure you’ve downloaded any necessary files in advance (if needed). After each session, the page will be updated with links to the corresponding zoom recording, as well as any additional materials/answer keys/etc. that were referenced during the workshop.

item.title: Professional Development / Journal Club
item.description: On this page, you will find resources associated with the Professional Development/Journal Club workshop series (zoom link, pw: sipps2021). Before each journal club session, check this page for details about which article that will be discussed. After each session in the series, the page will be updated with links to the corresponding zoom recording, as well as any additional materials that were referenced during the workshop. Week 1: What is a good research question?

item.title: Research Skills
item.description: On this page, you will find resources associated with the Research Skills workshop series (zoom link, pw: sipps2021). After each session in the series, the page will be updated with links to the corresponding zoom recording, as well as any additional materials that were referenced during the workshop. Week 1: How to make the most of your summer experience (Dr. Valerie Purdie-Greenaway) View Recording Workshop materials: workshop slides Week 2: Literature search & Zotero View Recording Workshop materials: workshop slides Week 3: Pre-registration & OSF View Recording Workshop materials: Workshop slides Activity Readme Datafile OSF Pre-registration template Week 4: Git (Version control & script sharing) View Recording
